unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing follower analytics get a desi twist

unnormalised: Hey there, influencer gang! Are you still scratching your heads trying to understand your follower demographics? Well, the days of generic data are over! New and improved follower analytics are hitting the Indian social media scene, promising a much deeper dive into who’s actually double-tapping those chai-time reels.
normalised: hey there influencer gang are you still scratching your heads trying to understand your follower demographics well the days of generic data are over new and improved follower analytics are hitting the indian social media scene promising a much deeper dive into who is actually double tapping those chai time reels

unnormalised: Forget just age and location; we're talking insights into interests, spending habits, even preferred brand of Diwali mithai! Imagine tailoring your content to folks in Delhi who love jalebi over gulab jamun.
normalised: forget just age and location we are talking insights into interests spending habits even preferred brand of diwali mithai imagine tailoring your content to folks in delhi who love jalebi over gulab jamun

unnormalised: Experts at IIT Mumbai are even working on AI to predict trending hashtags based on regional preferences. This Diwali 2024 (predicted spike around 2 PM, 12/11/2024), you’ll be ready.
normalised: experts at I I T mumbai are even working on A I to predict trending hashtags based on regional preferences this diwali two thousand and twenty four predicted spike around two P M twelfth november two thousand and twenty four you will be ready

unnormalised: Platform providers are hinting at rolling out these features by Republic Day, 26/01/2025, and some beta testers are already seeing a massive boost in engagement rates. Reports are coming in, starting from 10/10/2024, that suggest micro-influencers are seeing upto a 30% rise in reach with hyper-localized content! Get ready to say bye-bye to guessing games and hello to data-driven decisions! Now, go forth and conquer, mere pyaare dost!
